Posts.Content: Mar 12, 2008 07:09AM sirsmom wrote: I had cancer in the chest wall. In fact the tumor grew in the breast fold over into the breast wall, a very unusual place. I know that my surgeon ,while able to clear the margins in my chest, was not able to clear them to the accepted level. I did have my chest wall radiated.
Posts.Title: anyone have cancer on the chest wall pamaly koshka1
